mapper.select: select count(1) from account where flag <>99

select account_id,passport_id,email,mobile,reg_time,reg_ip,uniq_name as uniqname,gender,province_id,city_id,area_id,address,flag from account where flag <>99
limit #{param.start},#{param.limit}

select account_id,passport_id,email,mobile,reg_time,reg_ip,uniq_name as uniqname,gender,province_id,city_id,area_id,address,flag,ad1.name as province, ad2.name as city,ad3.name as area from account ac left join address ad1 on ac.province_id=ad1.id and ad1.level=1 left join address ad2 on ac.city_id = ad2.id and ad2.level=2 left join address ad3 on ac.area_id = ad3.id and ad3.level=3 where flag <>99
and account_id=#{account_id}
